name: Flappy Feathers - Tiny Bird Adventures
description:
Try and fly your way as far as possible without crashing into any of the pipes. The further you go the more intense it gets!

If you think you are up to the challenge, Flappy Feathers - Tiny Bird Adventures makes it incredibly simple to compare your scores with your friends. Make sure you score well so that you are victorious! Who's going to get the biggest score?

Features:
- High definition Retina display graphics
- Fast paced gameplay
- Dynamically generated content, every attempt is different
- Full Game Center compatibility
- Facebook and Twitter social features
- iOS 7 compatible
- Easy controls
- Nostalgic retro graphics

Warning: This game is very addictive!
